reviewText: Having visited Acadia National Park in Bar Harbor, ME, on more than one occasion, I was happy to have this DVD which features a great deal of history and information about the park, but even more satisfying is the stunningly beautiful photography and scenery. A first-rate production, narrated by an old pro, Jack Perkins; if you love National Parks and excellent videography, then this is a "must have"!
This video is excellent!  The photography brings you right to the park. It is an excellent arm chair trip.
